summary: Completed testing of premium gender filter system. Backend APIs working correctly - gender_filter is first feature in all premium packages, non-premium users have gender_filter_active=false even when specifying preferences, and profile gender update endpoint works properly. Frontend testing limited due to browser automation issues but key backend functionality verified.

integration_issues.issue: Browser crashes during Playwright testing preventing full UI verification

passed_tests: GET /api/packages - verified gender_filter is first feature in all premium packages (basic, pro, vip)
PUT /api/profile/gender - successfully updates user gender with valid values (male, female, other, prefer_not_to_say)
POST /api/chat/join-queue with gender_preference - correctly returns gender_filter_active=false for non-premium users
Anonymous users correctly blocked from profile gender updates
Registered users can update gender successfully
Non-premium users with gender preferences still get gender_filter_active=false
Premium packages API returns correct structure with gender_filter as priority feature
Backend matchmaking logic respects premium-only gender filtering

success_percentage.frontend: Partial (browser automation issues prevented full UI testing)
